text: Calymmodon cucullatus is a species of grammitid fern. It is endemic to China. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Polypodiaceae Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Ferns of Asia Category:Endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Calymmodon cucullatus
